NDM_metadata.name: Basic IPv4 Router
doc: TTP supporting basic unicast IPv4 Router applications.

Ed.Note: Should we make this TTP more abstract (e.g., remove table numbers)?
Ed.Note: Need to add security guidance.

table_map.name: ControlFiltering
doc: Control frame capture/filtering

table_map.name: IPv4Forwarding
doc: IPv4 forwarding
A VLAN ID valid on the wire at a port.
A unicast MAC address used to reach the L3 flow table
An IP address used to reach L3 control functions,
e.g. a unicast loopback address or a Router multicast address.
The unicast MAC address of a Router port on which a new L2 frame is transmitted.
The destination MAC address for a new L2 frame.
The VLAN ID of a locally attached L2 subnet on a Router.
A valid port number on the logical switch.
The LOCAL port must be supported to allow directing control frames to local control functions.
Ed.Note: The syntax used here for an enum value is not defined in the TTPv1.0 spec.

flow_tables.name: ControlFiltering
doc: Control frame capture/filtering

flow_mod_types.name: Control-Frame
doc: This match/action entry allows for flow_mods that match on either
ETH_TYPE or ETH_DST (or both) and send the packet to the
controller.  This behavior may be per port or for all ports.
Note for Conformance: A fully wildcarded entry is not expected to be used.
Note: VID match is optional to allow capture of untagged control (e.g., LLDP).
Ed.Note: Do we also want the option to match on TCP_SRC and UDP_SRC?
Ed.Note: Do we also need a DROP option?

flow_mod_types.name: Router-MAC
flow_mod_types.doc: Router MAC address, so send to IP forwarding table.

built_in_flow_mods.name: ControlFiltering-MISS
built_in_flow_mods.doc: Drop frames not destined for the Controller or Router.

flow_tables.name: IPv4Forwarding
doc: IPv4 unicast forwarding table.  For LPM (prefix match type) the flow_mod
priority must be the length of the prefix mask.
This flow talbe can also be used to capture L3 control packets,
e.g., BGP or ICMP addressed to the Router and forward them to the Controller

flow_mod_types.name: IPv4-Unicast
doc: LPM forwarding entry. Valid only if the priority value
matches the length of the prefix mask.
Ed.Note: Do we also need a DROP option?

flow_mod_types.name: IPv4-Control
doc: Capture L3 control packets and forward them to the Controller
Ed.Note: Do we also want the option to match on TCP_SRC and UDP_SRC?
Ed.Note: Do we also need a DROP option?

built_in_flow_mods.name: IPv4Forwarding-MISS
built_in_flow_mods.doc: Drop frames with no routing entry.

group_entry_types.name: NextHop
doc: Decrement IP TTL and add L2 header for next hop.
Entry per next hop IP address.
